                      throws java.io.IOException
Receives message from the server and converts it to a TextMessage.

Returns:

sendMessage

                 throws java.io.IOException
Method sends a TextMessage using this socket.

Parameters:

Throws:
java.io.IOException - some I/O error regarding the output stream
